name: HEFFNER FUNERAL CHAPEL & CREMATORY, INC., Ernie Heffner, Licensed Funeral Director and Scureman Funeral Home, Inc., Appellants v. DEPARTMENT OF STATE, BUREAU OF PROFESSIONAL AND OCCUPATIONAL AFFAIRS, and State Board of Funeral Directors, Appellees
name_abbreviation: Heffner Funeral Chapel & Crematory, Inc. v. Department of State

parties: HEFFNER FUNERAL CHAPEL & CREMATORY, INC., Ernie Heffner, Licensed Funeral Director and Scureman Funeral Home, Inc., Appellants v. DEPARTMENT OF STATE, BUREAU OF PROFESSIONAL AND OCCUPATIONAL AFFAIRS, and State Board of Funeral Directors, Appellees.

opinions.text:
ORDER
PER CURIAM:
AND NOW, this 26th day, of May 2004, the Order of the Commonwealth Court is hereby AFFIRMED.
opinions.author: PER CURIAM:

HEFFNER FUNERAL CHAPEL & CREMATORY, INC., Ernie Heffner, Licensed Funeral Director and Scureman Funeral Home, Inc., Appellants v. DEPARTMENT OF STATE, BUREAU OF PROFESSIONAL AND OCCUPATIONAL AFFAIRS, and State Board of Funeral Directors, Appellees.
